messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Construction Area.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Deathly Hazard XIII, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space-winter, a number of wire eating mammals have descended into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Auxiliary Base Construction.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to bad luck, a number of [REDACTED] have migrated into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Chemistry.
